analysis.key_quote: This disgusting abuse of power and politically-motivated punishment has no place in an honest democracy and turns the federal government into an embarrassing 3rd-world, dictatorial, authoritarian, untrustworthy, adversarial bully.
analysis.rationale: The comment explicitly opposes the proposed rule by highlighting concerns about political punishment and the erosion of democratic values, which aligns with themes of politicization and due process rights.
